results.title: Night Club on Fire
results.overview: Foreign, Foreign Action & Adventure, Foreign Dramas, Hong Kong, Mandarin Language, Cantonese Language, Foreign Regions, Foreign Languages - Competition heats up the night in this drama about the ladies who work at the Golden Pond club. Tensions rise as the owner of a rival establishment tries to lure in customers by persuading the Golden Pond's madam and her lovelies to defect to the Phoenix club. The situation escalates, and it's not long before the Golden Pond girls' lives are in danger. Diana Pang Dan, Charlie Cho Cha-Lei and K.K. Cheung Kwok-Keung star. Diana Pang Dan, Charlie Cho Cha-Lei and K.K. Cheung Kwok-Keung star.

results.title: The Fire Yogi
results.overview: Documentary, Faith & Spirituality Documentaries, Social & Cultural Documentaries, Faith & Spirituality - Witness a timeless rite of healing and purification as a 63-year-old yogi reclines in a bed of fire. This documentary reveals the mental and physical discipline that allows him to perform this stunning act. Confounding modern science, the yogi subsists on two bananas, a glass of milk and a trickle of water each day, deriving strength from meditation and breathing techniques. The result is the ability to endure, unharmed, a centuries-old ritual.

results.title: Aim, Fire, Scoot
results.overview: Joe and his sergeant fall for the same girl.

results.title: The New Fire Chief
results.overview: Small-town businessmen decide to establish a Fire Department; they lack polish, at first.

results.title: Baptism of Fire
results.overview: This 1943 Army training film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary in 1944.

results.title: Fire on the Mountain
results.overview: A documentary film about the exploits of the Tenth Mountain Division, an elite group of mountain climbers who fought decisive battles against the Nazis in the Italian Alps during the final days of World War II. From the intensive training atop the Colorado Rockies to the spectacular night climb of Italy's Riva Ridge.

results.title: Christmas Under Fire
results.overview: How Britain coped with a Christmas during the war.

results.title: Keepers Of The Fire
results.overview: For half of a millennium, First Nations women have been at the forefront of aboriginal peoples' resistance to cultural assimilation. Today, Native women are still fighting for the survival of their cultures and their peoples--in the rain forest and the city, in the courts and the legislatures, in the Longhouse and the media. Keepers of the Fire profiles Canada's Native 'warrior women' who are protecting and defending their land, their culture and their people in the time-honoured tradition of their foremothers.

results.title: Parrotville Fire Department
results.overview: 2nd Cartoon in the Rainbow Parade Series By Van Beuren.

results.title: Playing with Fire
results.overview: Cartoon classic starring Mutt and Jeff.

results.title: Fighting the Fire Bomb
results.overview: Documentary short explaining proper techniques for handling and disposal of incendiary bombs.

results.title: Fire from Olympia
results.overview: Documentary exploring the origins of the modern Olympic Games by following three athletes from Italy, Greece and Spain (all ancient Greek colonies) as they partake and examine the ancient sporting methods in Greece and two English Olympicks of the 19th century which were the forerunners and inspiration for the modern day Olympics.

results.title: The Fire Alarm
results.overview: 2 puppets are left to their uncle's attention who works at the Fire house.

results.title: Line of Fire
results.overview: In November of 1993, director Dominic Angerame was diagnosed with coronary arterial disease. A subsequent angiogram revealed that open heart surgery was necessary. The angiogram was filmed originally on 35mm motion picture film. Two years later, in March of 1995, his apartment burned down in the early morning hours. He was able to return to the scene the next day in order to film the aftermath. LINE OF FIRE is a blend of footage from these two episodes and explores the temporal nature of the lives we live.

results.title: The Signal Fire
results.overview: A short romantic drama in which a captain and his wife are separated by a shipwreck. The woman ends up on a desert island with another man, and they have a relationship. When they are saved by the captain, he decides to stay behind on the island, alone.

results.title: Crown of Fire
results.overview: Crown of Fire takes us on a journey into the cloistered world of renowned Benedictine artist, Dunstan Massey, OSB. Through his animated art work and contemplative encounter with a mysterious patriarch from the past, he tells the story of Benedict of Nursia. Benedict became the founder of Western monasticism - but not before overcoming a terrifying ordeal in the desert.

results.title: Ordeal by Fire
results.overview: The Ghost of Monk's Island Part Seven Ordeal by Fire
